# 2π

> The mathematical constant [π][pi] times 2.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var TWO_PI = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float64-two-pi' );
```

#### TWO_PI

The mathematical constant [π][pi] times `2`.

``` javascript
TWO_PI === 6.283185307179586;
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var TWO_PI = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float64-two-pi' );

console.log( TWO_PI );
// => 6.283185307179586
```

</section>
